What is the Certification Process?

Services KP Approvals Provide

Certification

From domestic and commercial Council approvals and Building permits to interpretng building codes and regulations, we want to make your certification process as simple as possible.

Inspections

Piers, finals, pool fencing, retrospective works and much more! KP Building Approvals offer building insptections for all work stages within Queensland and the Northern Territory

Consultation

KP Building Approvals offer Comprehensive building consultancy services including; alternative solutions, fire safety reports and building code interpretation and analysis.
